summary: The module sets up a lightweight Chainlit application that uses asynchronous file I/O to support a simple file‑asking workflow. It provides an initialization helper that launches the Chainlit runtime and prepares the environment for handling file interactions.
business_intent: To provide a quick, reusable entry point for a conversational interface that can request, read, or process files, enabling developers to integrate file‑based interactions into LLM‑driven applications or end‑to‑end test scenarios.
